divs: Sighting DetailsI was in my back yard jumping on a trampaline with some of my freinds and sawwhat appeared to be a bright light. Thinking it was an on coming air plain thelight being the head lights but ooo was i wrong as it got closer we could see itwasnt any airplain like ive ever seen. As it got directly over head i noted theshape for being a very large plus2B sighn and having no visable light sorce but still had a glowing orangishfeild around it and being only100feet over head i got a clear veiw so did carsbecouse people were chaseing what the yeld out there window a flying cross itmade not a sound and moved very slow at first but about a mile or so away itpicked up speed fast i meen fast it pulsed about 3 times before it vanished intospace.there where about 10 of us not including the car that took chase. i calledthe news but they didnt investigate becouse lack of photos.
